Hourly medians (with IQR) by parameter and period

Source: R/data.R
wq_hourly_median.Rd

Summary for plotting: within each parameter–period–hour cell, the median and IQR (25th/75th percentiles) of value.

Usage

wq_hourly_median

Format

A data frame with 68 observations and 6 variables:

parameter

Character. Parameter name.

period

Factor. "1990s" or "recent".

hour

Integer. 0–23.

median

Numeric. Median of value.

q1

Numeric. 25th percentile.

q3

Numeric. 75th percentile.

Details

Derived from yarra_wq_period in data-raw/prepare_yarra_data.R.

Examples

data(wq_hourly_median)
head(wq_hourly_median)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 6
#>   parameter         period  hour median    q1    q3
#>   <chr>             <chr>  <int>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 Salinity as EC@25 1990s      8    120  120    120
#> 2 Salinity as EC@25 1990s      9    250  170    280
#> 3 Salinity as EC@25 1990s     10    160  158.   175
#> 4 Salinity as EC@25 1990s     11    200  150    220
#> 5 Salinity as EC@25 1990s     12    230  210    235
#> 6 Salinity as EC@25 1990s     13    200  190    215
